metadata.title: CVE-2014-8564 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The _gnutls_ecc_ansi_x963_export function in gnutls_ecc.c in GnuTLS 3.xbefore 3.1.28, 3.2.x before 3.2.20, and 3.3.x before 3.3.10 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) via a crafted(1) Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) certificate or (2) certificatesigning requests (CSR), related to generating key IDs.

criterions.comment: gnutls28: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
